item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, January 15, 2025 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Why does Cloudflare Pages have such a generous free tier? (292 points | 169 comments)
2. Show HN: I made a tool to save multimedia from various platforms (38 points | 21 comments)
3. Ropey – A UTF8 text rope for manipulating and editing large texts. in Rust (154 points | 65 comments)
4. Sweden brings more books and handwriting practice back to its schools (2023) (214 points | 159 comments)
5. Israel, Hamas reach ceasefire deal to end 15 months of war in Gaza (19 points | discuss)
6. Why the weak nuclear force is short range (269 points | 114 comments)
7. Lambda Calculus in 383 Bytes (2022) (198 points | 30 comments)
8. Empirical Health is hiring interns to build data-driven primary care ( | hide)
9. GOG Joins European Federation of Game Archives, Museums & Preservation Projects (186 points | 23 comments)
10. Modern JavaScript for Django developers (120 points | 76 comments)
11. dnSpyEx: .NET debugger and assembly editor (14 points | 1 comment)
12. Scheduled Tasks in ChatGPT (51 points | 20 comments)
13. Code Reviews: A Success Story (18 points | 9 comments)
14. Google is making AI in Gmail and Docs free, but raising the price of Workspace (63 points | 98 comments)
15. Imaging mounted disk volumes under duress (2021) (39 points | 4 comments)
16. Sutton Hoo and Syria: The Anglo-Saxons Who Served in the Byzantine Army? (6 points | 1 comment)
17. Show HN: I Built a Fair Alternative to Product Hunt for Indie Makers Like You (54 points | 17 comments)
18. Sky-scanning complete for Gaia (122 points | 32 comments)
19. Natrium 'advanced nuclear' power plant wins Wyoming permit (34 points | 18 comments)
20. US will ban cancer-linked Red Dye No. 3 in cereal and other foods (174 points | 331 comments)
21. A marriage proposal spoken in office jargon (316 points | 164 comments)
22. KEON is a human-readable serde format that syntactic similar to Rust (32 points | 17 comments)
23. Homomorphic encryption in iOS 18 (307 points | 157 comments)
24. Nobody cares (151 points | 173 comments)
25. (Right-Nulled) Generalised LR Parsing (45 points | 1 comment)
26. Take the pedals off the bike (381 points | 393 comments)
27. Arnold's Cat (2018) (18 points | 4 comments)
28. Personalized voice recordings by Elwood "You've got mail!" Edwards (88 points | 24 comments)
29. TSMC begins producing 4-nanometer chips in Arizona (328 points | 297 comments)
30. Home Loss File System (366 points | 96 comments)
